Reason: The 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly affects the system performance by potentially blocking write operations for a certain amount of time while waiting for slow disk flushes to complete. This can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, especially on systems with slow disk flush speeds. The configuration involves time-extensive operations within the PeriodicCommitLogService class, contributing to significant performance impact.
